pkgmetadata.longdescription: Average Bioequivalence with Expanding Limits (ABEL) // Performs comparative bioavailability calculations for Average Bioequivalence with Expanding Limits (ABEL). Implemented are 'Method A' / 'Method B' and the detection of outliers. If the design allows, assessment of the empiric Type I Error and iteratively adjusting alpha to control the consumer risk. Average Bioequivalence - optionally with a tighter (narrow therapeutic index drugs) or wider acceptance range (South Africa: Cmax) - is implemented as well.
